name: PositiveAirwayPressureDevice
title: Positive Airway Pressure Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Positive airway pressure devices.),(Data Element Scope: Positive airway pressure devices approved for patient use by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Positive airway pressure devices.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exceptions.)

concept.display: Respiratory assist device, bi-level pressure capability, without backup rate feature, used with noninvasive interface, e.g., nasal or facial mask (intermittent assist device with continuous positive airway pressure device)

contains.display: Respiratory assist device, bi-level pressure capability, without backup rate feature, used with noninvasive interface, e.g., nasal or facial mask (intermittent assist device with continuous positive airway pressure device)
